title: CEP Campaign Finance Entity Type Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for major entity categories in campaign finance data (committees, candidates, donors).

terms.label: Political Committee
terms.definition: A registered political committee such as a candidate committee, party committee, PAC, or super PAC.

terms.label: Candidate
terms.definition: An individual seeking election to public office.

terms.label: Individual Donor
terms.definition: An individual contributing funds or in-kind value to a political committee.

terms.label: Organizational Donor
terms.definition: An organization contributing funds or in-kind value to a political committee, such as a corporation, union, or association.
